short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Chrome extension that alerts you if the price for the product you're browsing is different for non-prime users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Are you an Amazon Prime member?
- Do you enjoy free, one-day deliveries?
- Have you ever wondered whether you're getting the best price?

This extension is for you. When you browse Amazon products, it checks the non-prime prices for you in the background and will notify you if non-prime option is cheaper.

All you do is click on the notification and purchase via Incognito mode.

Once you're in incognito mode, simply add the product to the basket, and log in to finalise the purchase.

Happy saving!
